channel.title: Posts on mycleung
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on mycleung

item.title: Bootstrapping
item.description: Let’s talk about starting projects. Is there anything harder, more oppressive in the creative process than searching for that initial inspiration? The trope has existed for as long as stories have been told, through images of writers sat in front of blank pieces of paper, artists with empty canvasses, coders with empty directories… Okay, maybe I made the last one up. We coders get it a little easier with regards to getting started, with a well trodden path to follow.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: “Hey, while you’re working on that side project, maybe you should blog about it?” Fateful words spoken to me while I was describing a little idea, working title ‘matchymatchy’, to a friend at work… and now here we are! I’m planning on using this blog as a dev-diary of sorts to help keep a record of my experience building out this project and the various decisions, big and small, I make along the way.
